message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $130.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $110 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go lower than $120. I believe this product is well worth it.
Thank you for your response, Alice. Considering the product's value, I would like to offer $115 for it.
